roleset.name: reposting of a tweet
roleset.note: RETWEET-V NOTES: Based on sentences in Fargo flood twitter data. No comparisons. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from retweet.01-v)

role.descr: posted to; either audience or blog/board

example.name: with message only
example.text: retweeting the Red River of Fargo ND is at 39.28 ft.
example.arg: the Red River of Fargo ND is at 39.28 ft.

example.name: with args 0 and arg 2 as blog/board
